## String\_2.removePunctuation() function

Removes all punctuation (underscore, hyphen, brackets, quotation marks, etc)

**Signature:**

```typescript
function removePunctuation(input: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string |  |

**Returns:**

string

## Remarks

This removes the Unicode classes P (punctuation), S (symbols), and Cf (formatting characters).
